checklist.Text: End ML_RT_Hybridize program and remove ML Prep plate
Place ML Prep plate in highlighted area
Place Broadcast plate in highlighted area
Combine 204uL of Cleanup Mix with 1224ul (2x pulls of 612ul) of PCR Mix into labeled 1.5ml microcentrifuge tube
Place 1.5 mL tube of Cleanup Mix in tube rack
Prepare index primer plate and place in highlighted area
Load from Index Primer plate to ML Prep plate
Seal ML Prep plate with clear PCR seal
Spin down ML Prep plate in centrifuge
Set Thermocycler -> ML_Cleanup_PCR (1.5 hrs) |  (Do not leave plate on thermocycler for more than ~8hrs )
